title: Oat and Cocoa Cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '200g plain flour', '30g unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '250g porridge oats', '150g raisins']
